data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gravili, Cinzia, Vito, Doris De, Camillo, Cristina Gioia Di, Martell, Luis, Piraino, Stefano, Boero, Ferdinando (2015): The non-Siphonophoran Hydrozoa (Cnidaria) of Salento, Italy with notes on their life-cycles: an illustrated guide. Zootaxa 3908 (1): 1-187, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3908.1.1
